bayern.steinbrecher.gruen2.connection

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayern.steinbrecher.gruen2.connection.DBConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultConnection, SshConnection

    public abstract class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Represents a database connection.
    Author:
    Stefan Huber

      • execQuery

        public abstract java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> execQuery(java.lang.String sqlCode)
                                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Executes a query and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        sqlCode - The sql code to execute.
        Returns:
        Table containing the results AND the headings of each column. First dimension rows; second columns.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if the sql code is invalid.

      • execUpdate

        public abstract void execUpdate(java.lang.String sqlCode)

        Executes a command like INSERT INTO, UPDATE or CREATE.
        Parameters:
        sqlCode - The sql code to execute.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if the sql code is invalid.

      • checkColumn

        public boolean checkColumn(java.lang.String table,
                           java.lang.String column)
        Checks whether the given table of the configured database contains a specific column.
        Parameters:
        table - The name of the table to search for the column.
        column - The column name to search for.
        Returns:
        true only if the given table contains the given column.
